attributes.additional_details: Indeed, even if a solitary individual is forced to sleep rough in the uk, we should all consider that number to be one too many. At “The Invisibles”, it is not our aim to provide these people with accommodation or employment – although we wholeheartedly back such ideals – but to equip them with a variety of items to keep them as warm and comfortable as possible whilst they remain on the streets. Such items include clothing, sleeping bags and toiletries.
attributes.background: We aim to meet our goals by gathering donations from the public of sought-after items when the demand from frontline homeless organisations is there, before sorting through these items and delivering them too.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
